about_the_game:
Get all animals of the Banana Drama universe! The DLC includes:

- The giraffe (balanced)
- The tiger (balanced)
- The alpaca (balanced)
- The cockatoo (strong offense)
- The lion (strong offense)
- The cow (strong defense)
- The deer (strong defense)

With the purchase of this DLC you are supporting the developers and the further development of Banana Drama. Thank you very much!

All animal descriptions:

- Helicopter giraffe! Get the incredibly excited Banana Drama giraffe with this DLC. She has incredible balanced capabilities and is one of the best allrounders of all Banana Drama animals ("balanced" type). Sometimes she gets so excited that she can't stop spinning her head like a helicopter. Let's hope she doesn't fly away!

- Wow a tiger! Get the incredibly cute and sleepy Banana Drama tiger with this DLC. He has incredible balanced capabilities and is one of the best allrounders of all Banana Drama animals ("balanced" type). He is particularly proud of his beautiful coat and regularly impresses many female tigers with it.

- Alpapaca! Get the incredibly fluffy Banana Drama alpaca with this DLC. He has incredible balanced capabilities and is one of the best allrounders of all Banana Drama aimals ("balanced" type). Unfortunately, he is allergic to bananas and therefore often sneezes - he would like to point out that his sneezing is often mistaken for spitting. Please keep this in mind.

- Fly cockatoo! Get the incredibly agile Banana Drama cockatoo with this DLC. He has incredible offensive capabilities and is able to run/fly faster than others ("strong offense" type). Similar to his best friend "Kiki the cockatoo" his abilities are often underestimated due to his cute looks!

- Roaarrrr - the Lion! Get the incredibly proud Banana Drama lion with this DLC. He has incredible offensive capabilities and is able to run faster than others. A lion throwing bananas is a little unusual at first glance, but he has learnt this effective fighting technique from the monke(y)s!

- Cow (moo)! Get the incredibly sassy Banana Drama cow with this DLC. The cow has incredible defensive capabilities and is able to collect resources faster than others ("strong defense" type). The cow is very self-confident and often likes to show off its beautiful udder!

- Oh deer! Get the incredible shy Banana Drama deer with this DLC. He has incredible defensive capabilities and is able to collect resources faster than others ("strong defense" type). It's lucky that there are no roads or cars in Banana Drama, because that would be fatal for the deer!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 & 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 740
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Some imagination
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 & 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: One that is able to play sounds
  • Additional Notes: Permanent & stable high speed internet connection
